    Diagnosis of Root Cause based on APAR symptoms
    Author:
    Georgios D. Kontes

    • Constructor Detail

      • InferRootCause

        public InferRootCause()
        Instantiates the Diagnosis Engine

      • InferRootCause

        public InferRootCause(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix symptoms)
        Instantiates the Diagnosis Engine
        Parameters:
        symptoms - The symptoms of faults. These are probabilities of fault for each of the 28 APAR rules.

      • InferRootCause

        public InferRootCause(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix symptoms,
                      double faultThreshold)
        Instantiates the Diagnosis Engine
        Parameters:
        symptoms - The symptoms of faults. These are probabilities of fault for each of the 28 APAR rules.
        faultThreshold - The probability threshold above which a symptom is classified as a fault. Default value is 0.7;

    • Method Detail

      • getSymptoms

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix getSymptoms()
        Get the symptoms vector
        Returns:
        The symptoms of faults. These are probabilities of fault for each of the 28 APAR rules.

      • setFaultThreshold

        public void setFaultThreshold(double faultThreshold)
        Set the probability threshold for a fault
        Parameters:
        faultThreshold - The probability threshold above which a symptom is classified as a fault. Default value is 0.7;

      • getFaultThreshold

        public double getFaultThreshold()
        Get the probability threshold for a fault
        Returns:
        The probability threshold above which a symptom is classified as a fault. Default value is 0.7;

      • diagnose

        public void diagnose()
        Identify the possible root causes of a detected fault and print a summary of the discoveries.
